select recipe_seq.nextval from dual
insert into recipe (recipe_no,member_id,recipe_name,write_date,category) values (#{recipeNo}, #{memberVO.memberId}, #{recipeName}, sysdate, #{category})
insert into recipe_content (recipe_no, step_no, step_title, content, image_path) values (#{recipeNo}, #{stepNo}, #{stepTitle}, #{content}, #{imagePath})
insert into recipe_item (item_name, recipe_no, qty) values (#{itemName}, #{recipeNo}, #{qty})
mapper.select: select count(*) from recipe where category=#{value}
select count(*) from recipe_content where recipe_no=#{value}
select count(*) from recipe_item where recipe_no=#{value}
select step_no, content, image_path from recipe_content where recipe_no = #{value} order by step_no

SELECT rnum_view.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM as rnum, recipe_view.* FROM (SELECT r.recipe_no, m.nick, r.recipe_name, hits, r.category FROM RECIPE r, member m WHERE m.member_id = r.member_id ORDER BY recipe_no DESC)recipe_view )rnum_view WHERE rnum between #{startRowNumber} and #{endRowNumber}

SELECT x.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM as rn, r.recipe_no, m.nick, r.recipe_name, hits FROM RECIPE r, member m WHERE m.member_id = r.member_id and category=#{category} ORDER BY rn )x WHERE rn BETWEEN #{startRowNumber} and #{endRowNumber}
